name: raspi-htx-monitor
description: Raspberry Pi HTX (Huobi) portfolio monitor with touch UI

scripts.kiosk: sh -c 'sleep 5; URL=${PI_URL:-http://localhost:${PORT:-8080}}; if command -v chromium-browser >/dev/null 2>&1; then chromium-browser --kiosk --app="$URL" --enable-features=TouchEvents,OverlayScrollbar --overscroll-history-navigation=0; elif command -v chromium >/dev/null 2>&1; then chromium --kiosk --app="$URL" --enable-features=TouchEvents,OverlayScrollbar --overscroll-history-navigation=0; else xdg-open "$URL" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; fi'
scripts.pi: concurrently -k -n serve,kiosk -c green,cyan "npm run serve" "npm run kiosk"
